movies.title: The Valet
movies.plot: A Parisian valet loves a woman who rejects him: she's in debt to open a bookshop, and he's not her ideal man. A billionaire two-times his wealthy wife with his beautiful mistress, a young supermodel. To draw the paparazzi and his wife off the trail of adultery, and to give his lawyer time to arrange a divorce that won't cost him a fortune, the billionaire pays the supermodel and the valet to pretend for a month to be a couple. Within days, the bookshop owner and the billionaire are jealous, the supermodel experiences life with a nice guy, and the valet has status and self-confidence. What will each do with newfound wisdom?
movies.simplePlot: A porter and a top-model have to pretend to be a couple in order to salvage a CEO's marriage.

biography.bio: Gad was born in Morocco in April 1971. His father was a mime. He was a student at Georges Bizet school and Lycée Lyautey in Casablanca but didn't like school much. In 1988, Gad left Casablanca to go to Montreal. He stayed there for 4 years, during which he was a political science student for one year, worked on radio, wrote humorous stories and played them in night clubs. In 1992, he came to Paris and took Le Cours Florent course where he has, among others, Isabelle Nanty as a teacher. He wrote a one-man show named 'Décalages' which told a lot about his experiences in Montreal and Paris in 1996. Three years later, he presented his second one-man show named 'La Vie Normale', again staged by Isabelle Nanty. Gad was revealed as a humorist but is also a great actor who starred in various French movies. Gad lived with French actress Anne Brochet and has a son, Noé. One of his best friends in business is Jamel Debbouze.
biography.name: Gad Elmaleh

biography.bio: Before wanting to be actress, Alice Taglioni first began as a pianist formation to the Music Conservatory of Paris. To overcome her shyness, she takes theater courses and quickly catches the virus of comedy. She begins her film career in 2001 in the La bande du drugstore (2002) and Quatre copains (2001). She obtains one of the principal roles of Brocéliande (2003), plays in Le pharmacien de garde (2003) and Grande école (2004) in 2002. The film Mensonges et trahisons et plus si affinités... (2004) in 2003 gave her the recognition of the public. Alice next embarked on more prestigious productions of the year 2005. She was a pilot in Les chevaliers du ciel (2005), then acted in Le cactus (2005) and also acted with Gad Elmaleh in The Valet (2006) by Francis Veber.
biography.name: Alice Taglioni

biography.bio: Daniel Auteuil was born on January 24, 1950 in Algiers, Alger, France. He is an actor and director, known for Caché (2005), 36th Precinct (2004) and Un Coeur en Hiver (1992). He has been married to Aude Ambroggi since July 22, 2006. They have one child. He was previously married to Emmanuelle Béart and Anne Jousset.
biography.name: Daniel Auteuil

biography.bio: Kristin Scott Thomas was born in Redruth, Cornwall, England, to Deborah (Hurlbatt) and Lieutenant Commander Simon Scott Thomas. Her ancestry includes Welsh, English, and Dutch. Her father was a pilot for the British Royal Navy and died in a flying accident in 1964. Her stepfather was also a pilot and died six years later under similar circumstances. Her childhood home was Dorset, England. She left at the age of 19 to work as an au pair in Paris. She was married to François Oliviennes, with whom she had three children, Hannah, Joseph, and George.
biography.name: Kristin Scott Thomas

biography.bio: Richard Berry was born on July 31, 1950 in Paris, France as Richard Élie Benguigui. He is an actor and writer, known for L'immortel (2010), Ruby & Quentin (2003) and The Valet (2006). He has been married to Pascale Louange since September 17, 2016. They have one child. He was previously married to Jessica Forde and Jeane Manson.
biography.name: Richard Berry

biography.bio: Virginie Ledoyen was born Virginie Fernandez on 15 November 1976 in Aubervilliers, near Paris. At the age of 2, she was already shooting advertisements for television. At 9, she started going to the École des Enfants du Spectacle, and made her film debut at 10 in What Every Frenchwoman Wants (1987). She was then nominated for the César (the French equivalent of an Oscar) for most promising actress in 1993, 1994 and 1995. Her international breakthrough was in 1999, when she became ambassador for the cosmetics L'Oréal; this led to her casting in The Beach (2000), with Leonardo DiCaprio.
biography.name: Virginie Ledoyen

biography.bio: Dany Boon was born on June 26, 1966 in Armentières, Nord, France as Daniel Hamidou. He is an actor and writer, known for Bienvenue chez les Ch'tis (2008), Supercondriaque (2014) and Mic Macs à Tire-Larigot (2009). He has been married to Yaël Boon since December 26, 2003. They have three children. He was previously married to Judith Godrèche.
biography.name: Dany Boon

biography.bio: Michel Jonasz was born on January 21, 1947 in Drancy, France. He is an actor, known for The Valet (2006), Un Amour à taire (2005) and Dalida (2005).
biography.name: Michel Jonasz

biography.bio: Michel Aumont was born on October 15, 1936 in Paris, France. He is an actor, known for Un dimanche à la campagne (1984), The ComDads (1983) and Le placard (2001).
biography.name: Michel Aumont

biography.bio: Laurent Gamelon was born on June 19, 1960 in Boulogne-Billancourt, Hauts-de-Seine, France. He is an actor and writer, known for Ruby & Quentin (2003), Confidences trop intimes (2004) and Le placard (2001).
biography.name: Laurent Gamelon

biography.bio: Patrick Mille was born in 1970 in Lisbon, Portugal. He is an actor and writer, known for 99 francs (2007), Crime d'amour (2010) and The Valet (2006).
biography.name: Patrick Mille

biography.bio: Michèle Garcia is known for her work on Monsieur Batignole (2002), Le placard (2001) and The Valet (2006).
biography.name: Michèle Garcia

biography.bio: Philippe Magnan was born on August 21, 1948. He is an actor, known for La veuve de Saint-Pierre (2000), Ridicule (1996) and Rien à déclarer (2010).
biography.name: Philippe Magnan

biography.bio: Jean-Yves Chilot is an actor, known for The Valet (2006), A Perfect Plan (2012) and L'étang (2002).
biography.name: Jean-Yves Chilot

biography.bio: Irina Ninova was born in 1976. She is an actress, known for Le placard (2001), The Valet (2006) and 8th Wonderland (2008).
biography.name: Irina Ninova

categories.category: Best Supporting Actor (Meilleur acteur dans un second rôle)
Actress of the Year (Actrice de l'année)
